subject: Copa America (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Luis Suárez scored in the 53rd and 58th minutes to lead Uruguay past Peru, 2-0, in La Plata, Argentina, and into the Copa América final.
snippet: Luis Suárez scored in the 53rd and 58th minutes to lead Uruguay past Peru, 2-0, in La Plata, Argentina, and into the Copa América final.
